diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $TU$ is $x+2$ units
The length of the line $VU$ is $3$ units
The length of the line $ST$ is $4$ units
The length of the line $RS$ is $2x$ units
Point $S$ lies on the line connecting $R$ and $T$
Point $U$ lies on the line connecting $T$ and $V$
The line connecting $S$ and $T$ is perpendicular to the line connecting $S$ and $U$
The line connecting $R$ and $V$ is perpendicular to the line connecting $V$ and $U$
line_instances: The line connecting $ST$ is perpendicular to the line connecting $SU$
The line connecting $RT$ is perpendicular to the line connecting $RV$
